newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain's Argentaria issues $250 mln pref shares.
newsitem.headline: Spain's Argentaria issues $250 mln pref shares.

text.p: Spanish bank Argentaria said on Tuesday it had issued $250 million preference shares in the U.S. market.
The share carries a fixed cash dividend of 7.80 percent and the issue is lead managed by Merrill Lynch, the bank said.

"This issue contributes to increasing the basic equity capital of the group, reinforcing the solid equity base in the face of the development of the activities contemplated in the Strategic Agenda which will absorb signficant resources," the bank said in a statement.
No further details of the issue were immediately available.
